name: The Path More Taken
description:
Click around to draw a path to please the visitors that are scheduled to come that day. Once you've completed a path (beginning and ending at the map's edge), your daily visitors will walk and think about what they see. Different visitors have different preferences for seeing beauty, education, rough terrain, and animals!

Controls:
  • Left-click to place a trail waypoint
  • Mouse to edge of screen to pan camera
  • Mouse-wheel to zoom in and out
  • W A S D or arrow keys - move camera up, left, down, or right

Have fun!
